name: travel-guide
description: It is an online platform that provides travelers' reviews on a wide variety of places, such as hotels, restaurants, tourist attractions, and other places of interest in a specific city. It can be very useful for planning your vacation, seeing the recommendations of people who have visited the place before you, and learning what they say about the quality and service.
author: arkx-teams: abelbouchikhi, hamid7x, expo-01, yataji
